sentences.english: Project is located in the former Central New Film Factory near North Third Ring Road area.
sentences.chinese: 项目选址在原中央新影厂靠近北三环的区域。

sentences.english: This recognition will provide an important basis for repository siting in the site area.
sentences.chinese: 这一认识，为处置库选址提供了重要依据。

sentences.english: Site-selection is the key in the construction and operation of sanitary landfill.
sentences.chinese: 选址是卫生填埋场建设和运行的关键。

sentences.english: A bitter controversy about the siting of the airport is rumbling in the designing institute.
sentences.chinese: 设计院里正吵吵嚷嚷着对机场选址问题作激烈争论。

sentences.english: I didn't know when I was siting it that I had a thrips infestation nearby.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道什么时候我认为我的选址有蓟马虫害附近。

sentences.english: Zhang says that when it comes to deciding where to place wind power plants, this resolution is not good enough.
sentences.chinese: 张强说，这样的分辨率对于风电站选址来说可不够。

sentences.english: Sanhuan phase of housing plots are for the siting procedures.
sentences.chinese: 三环二期经济适用房地块正在办理选址手续。

sentences.english: Substation locating is an important part of power system planning.
sentences.chinese: 变电所选址是电力系统规划的一个重要环节。

sentences.english: A basis for selection of pollution discharge positions is provided.
sentences.chinese: 据此可为桑沟湾沿岸的排污口选址提供依据。

sentences.english: The Site Selection Report is downloadable from EPD's website.
sentences.chinese: 选址研究报告可以从环保署网址下载。

sentences.english: Location of the new eco-restaurant can also be rebuilt using the original greenhouse.
sentences.chinese: 生态餐厅既可选址新建，也可利用原有温室改建。

sentences.english: Starting location of the port area and construction program after finalizing , it is necessary to accelerate.
sentences.chinese: 港口起步区的选址和建设方案敲定后，要加快推进。

sentences.english: The problem is that the siting of such a system be on the basis of optimized.
sentences.chinese: 选址的问题就是在这样一个系统的基础上加以优化。

sentences.english: What is the yardage of this golf course?
The Leisure Thematic Exhibition Hall is located in the White Horse Lake Convention & Exhibition Center.
sentences.chinese: 主题馆选址位于滨江区的白马湖生态创意城会展中心。

sentences.english: Kahn's siting of the building reasserts the spatial and topographical order of the site.
sentences.chinese: 康为建物的选址再次主张了基地内空间及地形的道。

definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
to be right next to/close neighbor
to open a business/to open a practice/open (for business)
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
